name: Nature Survives
description:
Nature Survives is a single player real-time strategy game based in an ever-changing forest environment, where enemies attack at night.

Build your base, gather resources and increase your economy during the day because you need to be equipped when night time comes.

A fog of war shrouds the world in mystery, and obscures your enemies. It will be up to you to explore and make use of the world in any way you can before a long night of carnage and onslaught threatens everything you have worked towards.

Don’t worry, even if your civilization falls, nature survives.
